statements: SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM employee_performance_data ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_performance_data WHERE performance_rating < 3;
SELECT employee_name, performance_review FROM employee_performance_data WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, performance_rating FROM employee_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, performance_review FROM employee_performance_data WHERE LENGTH(employee_name) > 10 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 4 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, performance_rating FROM employee_performance_data WHERE performance_review IS NOT NULL ORDER BY employee_name, performance_rating ASC;
SELECT employee_name AS Name, ROUND(performance_rating) AS Rating FROM employee_performance_data ORDER BY Rating DESC, Name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(review_id) as total_reviews FROM performance_reviews GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_id, name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM performance_reviews;
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT name, department FROM employees
SELECT employee_id, name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC
SELECT reviewer, rating FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating > 4
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE reviewer = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employees.name, performance_reviews.rating FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id;

SELECT employees.name, feedback.feedback_text, feedback.reviewer FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id JOIN feedback ON performance_reviews.review_id = feedback.review_id WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Employee
SELECT employee_id, name FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM Employee GROUP BY department
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY name DESC, hire_date ASC
SELECT e.name, e.department, pr.rating FROM Employee e JOIN PerformanceReview pr ON e.employee_id = pr.employee_id WHERE pr.rating > 3
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM Employee
SELECT e.name, m.name AS manager_name FROM Employee e JOIN Manager m ON e.department = m.department
SELECT d.name AS department_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Department d LEFT JOIN Employee e ON d.department_id = e.department GROUP BY d.department_id
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, department FROM employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_review WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT name, hire_date FROM employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT reviewer_id, name, email FROM reviewer;
SELECT id, name, department FROM employee WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee.name, performance_score, review_date FROM performance_review JOIN employee ON performance_review.employee_id = employee.id WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM department JOIN employee ON department.department_id = employee.id GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT reviewer.name, review_date, feedback_text FROM reviewer JOIN feedback ON reviewer.reviewer_id = feedback.review_id ORDER BY review_date DESC;

SELECT employee.name, department, performance_score, feedback_text FROM employee JOIN performance_review ON employee.id = performance_review.employee_id JOIN feedback ON performance_review.review_id = feedback.review_id WHERE employee_id = 1;
